item.description:
Midnight Rodeo Bar invites you to help celebrate a special night with Bobby Carlson & Stones River.

Through his manager Jeff Davis, Bobby recently signed a Promotion
Agreement wih Spotlight Records. and his public relations team Larry Alessio and George Kidder are coming up to New England to see him perform for the first time and we need everyone to let them know how much we love Bobby Carlson & Stones River at Midnight Rodeo Bar.

John Black from Country Locals will also be there making a video, so it will be a night you won't want to miss.
item.name: Midnight Rodeo Bar Meetup
